item.title: Plain White T's - 1, 2, 3, 4

Give me more loving
than I’ve ever had
Make it all better
when I’m feeling sad
Tell me
that I’m special even
When I know
I’m not

when I hurt so bad

mad

easy

to do

I love you

to say

that’s what I’ll do

you
